ultra.prompt:
Phone screen showing ${amount}/month bill notification. female, 20, brown hair, white tee, At a gas station.

Explosively candid: "I was paying $120 a month for car insurance until I found a link that changed everything. After a quick two-minute check, I qualified for $39 a month. Same coverage, way less money. Apparently, a new law means drivers insured for over a year could get a lower rate, but you have to request it."

Fast dolly-in. Eye contact. Natural gestures. UGC testimonial style.
4K. 12s.

CONVERSION ELEMENTS:
- Pattern interrupt: Eyes widening at calculator total

SCROLL-STOPPER: Shocking visual contrast at key moment to break pattern
ultra.script_segment: I was paying $120 a month for car insurance until I found a link that changed everything. After a quick two-minute check, I qualified for $39 a month. Same coverage, way less money. Apparently, a new law means drivers insured for over a year could get a lower rate, but you have to request it.

ultra.purpose: Social proof - solution works for real people
ultra.prompt:
Phone screen showing ${amount}/month bill notification. female, 20, brown hair, white tee, Inside a car repair shop.

Unshakably bold: "It's not automatic. If you've had insurance for 12+ months, don't overpay like I did. Click the link below to check if you qualify."

Fast dolly-in. Eye contact. Natural gestures. UGC testimonial style.
4K. 12s.

SCROLL-STOPPER: Shocking visual contrast at key moment to break pattern
ultra.script_segment: It's not automatic. If you've had insurance for 12+ months, don't overpay like I did. Click the link below to check if you qualify.

ultra.purpose: Call to action - create urgency to act
ultra.prompt:
